name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"

name: 羽賀
message: "Aoba!"
Koujaku and Mr. Haga's faces light up when they see me. They run up to me, breathless.

name: 紅雀
message: "You okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "More or less."

name: 羽賀
message: "Thank goodness."

name: ベニ
message: "Hey, that mutt of yours okay too?"

name: 蓮
message: "I'm right here."
Ren pops his head out of my bag to look up at Beni, who's sitting on Koujaku's shoulder.

name: 紅雀
message: "That guy in the gas mask found me, saying you'd been kidnapped or something!"

name: 紅雀
message: "I didn't believe it at first, but then I couldn't get a hold of you."

name: 紅雀
message: "I tried Tae, but I couldn't get through to her either. I mean, I know she's never been a fan of Coils, but..."
He looks past me, scowling.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, isn't that..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, right..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Son of a bitch... you're the leader of Scratch, aren't you?!"
Scratch?
Wait, isn't that the Rib gang made up of escaped prisoners?

name: 紅雀
message: "How did you not know?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean... I've never really seen Scratch's tag before."

name: ミンク
message: "...Hmph."
Mink lets out a contemptuous snort.
The building he had me in was so dark and dirty, I couldn't get a good look at anything.
But thinking back... maybe I did see a tag...
I recall what I know about Scratch.

Supposedly, it's made up of guys their leader busted out of prison.

The police are barely functional as is, so as long as they don't make too much trouble, it's not worth rounding them up.
Oh, that explains the "discipline" thing.
Keeping hardened criminals in line can't be easy, especially not in a town like this.
They'd need rules for the gang to function, and harsh punishments for anyone who breaks them.

name: ベニ
message: "New meat, huh?"
Beni is glaring at the cockatoo.
The cockatoo turns away, like he couldn't care less.

name: 羽賀
message: "What a lovely cockatoo."

name: クリア
message: "It really is beautiful."

name: ベニ
message: "Hmph, think you can get away with ignoring me? Punk-ass bitch."

name: トリ
message: "This one's got a mouth, huh? Not much use for a sparrow who can't sing sweetly."

name: ベニ
message: "Fuck you, man! Who do you think you are?!"
Beni puffs himself up into a ball. I guess he's got an especially short temper when it comes to other birds.

name: 紅雀
message: "Things were bad enough already. Now I have to deal with this shitbag? Why don't you be a good little criminal and scurry on back to your cell?"

name: ミンク
message: "You're in no position to talk."

name: 紅雀
message: "Excuse me? And why the fuck are you here with Aoba? Just try laying a finger on him. I dare you."

name: ミンク
message: "That's none of your business either."

name: 紅雀
message: "Who the fuck do you think you're talkin' to?"
I don't like where this is going...

name: 羽賀
message: "N-Now now, calm down."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why don't we go inside already? We're blocking the door."
Koujaku shoots Mink another glare, which Mink meets unflinching.
Great...
We just got here, and I'm already exhausted.
